name: Popover
description: Popover renders its own floating surface anchored to a trigger element. (For internal use only)

props.name: children
props.doc: Alternative content prop. Accepts nodes or a render function that receives the same helpers as `content`.

props.name: content
props.doc: Content rendered inside the popover. Can also be a render function that receives helpers such as `close`.

props.name: title
props.doc: Optional heading shown above the body content. Matches the typography used in TermDefinition.

props.name: trigger
props.doc: Custom trigger element or render function. Required unless you point Popover at an existing element using `targetElement` / `targetSelector`.
type: ({ active, ref, toggle, open, close }) => React.ReactNode

props.name: triggerAttributes
props.doc: Extra HTML attributes passed to the default trigger wrapper (e.g. aria-*).

props.name: triggerClassName
props.doc: Class name merged with the default trigger wrapper.

props.name: triggerOffset
props.doc: Spacing in pixels between the trigger element and the popover surface.

props.name: targetRefreshKey
props.doc: Forces the popover to recalculate its layout whenever this value changes. Useful when the trigger moves but the DOM tree stays mounted.

props.name: targetElement
props.doc: Existing DOM element (or ref) used instead of a rendered trigger. Provide `{ horizontalRef, verticalRef }` when horizontal and vertical anchors differ.
type: { horizontalRef?: HTMLElement | React.MutableRefObject<HTMLElement>; verticalRef?: HTMLElement | React.MutableRefObject<HTMLElement> }

props.name: targetSelector
props.doc: CSS selector pointing to an element in the document to use as the trigger target.

props.name: horizontalOffset
props.doc: Horizontal offset in pixels to adjust the popover placement. Positive values move the popover to the right, negative values move it to the left. Useful for fine-tuning alignment when the default placement needs adjustment.

props.name: arrowEdgeOffset
props.doc: Offset in pixels from the edge when the arrow is positioned at the edge. When set, this value replaces the default edge spacing (8px) and arrow boundary (8px). Useful for components like Tooltip that need the arrow closer to the edge.

props.name: openInitially
props.doc: Whether the popover should be open by default when uncontrolled.

props.name: open
props.doc: Controls the open state when provided. Use together with `onOpenChange`.

props.name: placement
props.doc: Preferred placement of the popover relative to the trigger.

props.name: alignOnTarget
props.doc: Adjust horizontal alignment of the popover body when `placement` is `top`/`bottom`; ignored for other placements.

props.name: arrowPosition
props.doc: Align the arrow along the axis of the selected `placement` (e.g., left/right for `placement="right"`).

props.name: arrowPositionSelector
props.doc: CSS selector that points to the element the arrow should align with. When the popover points vertically it aligns horizontally, and vice versa for horizontal placements.

props.name: hideArrow
props.doc: Hide the arrow element from the popover. When `true`, the arrow will not be rendered regardless of the `arrowPosition` prop.

props.name: theme
props.doc: Sets the surface style.

props.name: contentClassName
props.doc: Additional class name(s) merged into the popover content wrapper.

props.name: baseClassName
props.doc: Overrides the default BEM root block. Useful when mirroring Popover styles.

props.name: hideOutline
props.doc: Removes the outline/border that normally surrounds the popover surface.

props.name: hideCloseButton
props.doc: Removes the built-in close button.

props.name: disableFocusTrap
props.doc: Stops rendering the focus-trap button used to return focus to the trigger.

props.name: focusOnOpen
props.doc: If true, focus is moved into the popover content when it opens.

props.name: focusOnOpenElement
props.doc: Provide a specific element (or function returning one) to receive focus when the popover opens.

props.name: restoreFocus
props.doc: Moves focus back to the trigger element once the popover closes (defaults to true).

props.name: preventClose
props.doc: Prevent closing the popover when interacting outside of it or pressing Escape. Useful when the popover needs to stay open while other parts of the page are interacted with.

props.name: showDelay
props.doc: Delay (ms) before the popover becomes active. Useful for hover-triggered popovers.

props.name: hideDelay
props.doc: Delay (ms) before the popover starts hiding. Defaults to 0.

props.name: noInnerSpace
props.doc: Remove the default padding inside the popover by setting `--inner-space: 0` on the surface.

props.name: closeButtonProps
props.doc: Customize the built-in close button (icon, title, variant, etc.).

props.name: skipPortal
props.doc: Render inline instead of inside the shared Popover portal.

props.name: portalRootClass
props.doc: Extra className applied to the portal wrapper (only when not using `skipPortal`).

props.name: keepInDOM
props.doc: Keep the portal mounted in the DOM even when the popover is closed. Useful when the content should preserve its state.

props.name: noAnimation
props.doc: Disable show/hide animations.

props.name: fixedPosition
props.doc: Use fixed positioning so the popover follows the viewport instead of the page scroll.

props.name: autoAlignMode
props.doc: Control when the popover automatically flips its placement to fit within the viewport. `initial` (default): Flip placement only on initial open when there's limited space. `scroll`: Flip placement on initial open and during scroll events. `never`: Never automatically flip placement, always use the specified `placement` property.

props.name: contentRef
props.doc: Ref forwarded to the popover content element.

props.name: omitDescribedBy
props.doc: Skips adding aria-describedBy on the trigger when you handle accessibility yourself.
